title: Packing and Covering Triangles in Tripartite Graphs

lemmas.name: tuza_tripartite

lemmas.proof_technique: Structural analysis of triangle intersections in tripartite setting
implications: Any nu=4 counterexample is NOT tripartite

lemmas.name: tripartite_triangle_structure
lemmas.statement: In tripartite G, triangles have exactly one vertex in each part

key_insight: Tripartite structure severely restricts how triangles can intersect, making Tuza provable.
implications_for_nu4: Rules out bipartite + one vertex type constructions
notes: Earlier than Haxell 1999 (66/23 bound). Different technique.
